name: Cow Cat | Gen 9 &Snappy &Vrgn
bio: Uh, hi! I'm Cow Cat | Gen 9 &Snappy &Vrgn. In high school, I was voted most likely to work at NASA. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their silk scarves and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. We can be friends, but keep the ultra purrsonal stuff to yourself, please.
